p: In Group A, the first step of total urethral reconstruction of the "Sandwich‚Äù was started with the reconstruction of the posterior wall via reconstructing Denonvillier's fascia in two layers. In the first layer, the upper end of the severed fascia was sutured with MDR (median dorsal ralph) ( Figure 1); and, in the second layer, MDR was sutured with the bladder wall at the back of the posterior lip of the bladder neck ( Figure 2).
